\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[522c6d444568b8f9539c1f066ae5b008]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={47}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[01bdcdec3ab27518fe97d882b19920f8]%mdk
$x^{m\lambda} = 1 \pmod {m^2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={47}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[56ecec110c10702cce8dbe158d4edca9]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={50}
\begin{aligned}
   |\Z_{p^2}^*| = \phi(p^2) = p(p-1) \\
   |\Z_{q^2}^*| = \phi(q^2) = q(q-1)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={55}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2816d46d2cee968b89745329d91913b3]%mdk
$x^{m\lambda} = x^{pq\lambda} = x^{p(p-1)c_1q} = (x^{p(p-1)})^{c_1q} = 1^{c_2p} = 1 \pmod {p^2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={55}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a7a4ea9493603e6e77bf026346f5a8a1]%mdk
$x^{m \lambda} =x^{pq\lambda} = x^{q(q-1)c_2p} = (x^{q(q-1)})^{c_2p} = 1^{c_2p} = 1 \pmod {q^2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={57}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[45b11664646acb225ac8f7c9c586a506]%mdk
$x^{m\lambda} = 1 \pmod {p^2q^2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={57}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f9e43442019568f144b4eac480b614e3]%mdk
$m^2 = p^2q^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={59}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[eb2f993828c05c2a24ff8347d6aa57df]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={69}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[381733ee052cc6c8bb70bcb26adacea6]%mdk
$E_g: \Z_m \times \Z^*_m \to \Z_{m^2}^*$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={70}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[059acb51cb4c42de3c6722dc9faa3eb1]%mdk
$E_g \mapsto g^xy^n \pmod n^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={71}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6f8f57715090da2632453988d9a1501b]%mdk
$m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={71}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a4b6d8d4254cf17796fdbb414b905c2e]%mdk
$E_g(m,r)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={71}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d162a442ebc99214a7ea8a21c0212e4e]%mdk
$r \in_R \Z_m^*$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={75}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0bd890413bed9e9302718c8ccc74cda7]%mdk
$E_g$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={75}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3321e46f177e85eee0ead743b5abcaff]%mdk
$|Z_m \times Z_m^*| = m\phi(m) = |\Z_{n^2}^*|$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={76}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0bd890413bed9e9302718c8ccc74cda7]%mdk
$E_g$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={76}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7e523f70566941cdb0700bba1418f43b]%mdk
$(m_1,r_1),(m_2,r_2) \in \Z_m \times Z_m^*$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={77}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[934a28ae47215043ed0bf964beeb974b]%mdk
$E_g(m_1, r_1) = E_g(m_2,r_2)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={77}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3027caa11bcd8864c5fdd0e3d66b6fbc]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={80}
\begin{aligned}
  g^{m_1}r_1^n = E_g(m_1,r_1) = E_g(m_2,r_2) = g^{m_2}r_2^n \pmod{m^2}\\
  \implies g^{m_1 - m_2}r_1^m = r_2^m \pmod{n^2} \\
  \implies  g^{(m_1 - m_2)\lambda} r_1^{\lambda m} = r_2^{m\lambda} \pmod{m^2} \\
  \implies g^{(m_1 - m_2)\lambda} = 1 \pmod {m^2}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={87}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b2f5ff47436671b6e533d8dc3614845d]%mdk
$g$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[77337464db5f92230995c3873d861a16]%mdk
$(m_1 - m_2)\lambda$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b2f5ff47436671b6e533d8dc3614845d]%mdk
$g$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3beb346607c2fc3615f90486b290a1ca]%mdk
$m \mid (m_1 - m_2)\lambda$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={89}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b2f5ff47436671b6e533d8dc3614845d]%mdk
$g$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={89}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e09d672ddab652ec34133c73dc054f2e]%mdk
$m^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={89}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6f8f57715090da2632453988d9a1501b]%mdk
$m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={90}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ad90fe8ec220c3023c1967d1946c71a1]%mdk
$m \mid (m_1 - m_2) \lambda$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={90}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[11f638e64c5ce6455d9b55619a486829]%mdk
$gcd(\lambda,m) = 1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={91}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0f0f72548b5414bc3c9ec0b0e120383d]%mdk
$m \mid (m_1 - m_2)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={91}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[398b7025c729d835a7f8b95d5e78f3de]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={93}
\begin{aligned}
(m_1 - m_2) &= 0 \pmod m \\
\implies m_1 &= m_2 \pmod m \\
\implies m_1 &= m_2
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={99}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b7860a652efc643bed45365e4a4ff6b0]%mdk
$r_1^m = r_2^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={99}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ad2a429e655b109821b86f87d6db49dd]%mdk
$r \in \Z^*_m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={100}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[34ddb2885cf673374afb25672891f3ea]%mdk
$r_1 = r_2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={100}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[571812ae2f9b1c852f73fb86871486fb]%mdk
$(m_1,r_1) = (m_2, r_2)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={100}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[76c0b375dcd8253c8ade149551732017]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={104}
[c]_g = E_g^{-1}(c)_1
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={107}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4fa646f2c1a1f6eb0eb33dfffbde091d]%mdk
$w \in \Z_{m^2}^*$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={107}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[988bfcf7c868a95b9cf5a118f2bebdbd]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={109}
\Lambda(w) = \lambda [w]_{m+1} \pmod {m}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={111}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[9007e849c1dedbec7aae9dda0b9bb0c8]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={113}
\begin{aligned}
  w &= E_{n+1}([w]_{m+1}, r) \pmod{m^2} \\ 
  &= (n+1)^{[w]_{m+1}}r^m \pmod{m^2} \\
  \implies w^{\lambda} &= (n+1)^{[w_{m+1}\lambda]}r^{m\lambda} \pmod{m^2} \\
  &= (n+1)^{[w_{m+1}\lambda]} \pmod{m^2} \\
  &= 1 + \lambda[w]_{m+1}m \pmod{m^2} \\
  \implies \frac{w^{\lambda} - 1}{m} &= \lambda[w]_{m+1} \pmod m \\
  \implies \Lambda(w) &= \lambda[w]_{m+1} \pmod m 
\end{aligned} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={123}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[03eada3f015d9cf4e14b51f3e887f100]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={125}
\begin{aligned}
\Lambda(c)\Lambda^{-1}(g) &=  \lambda[c]_{m+1} (\lambda [g]_{m+1})^-1 \pmod m\\
&= [c]_{m+1}[g]_{m+1}^{-1}\pmod m \\
&= [c]_g \pmod m
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={132}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7af1a6c80d49fa1096759656810b2443]%mdk
$c \in \Z_{n^2}^*$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={132}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b3c11d4d14dfbaa3bd8487557951be95]%mdk
$g_1,g_2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={132}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[0579c7e47c83efb49e11e53e3fb3080c]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={134}
\begin{aligned}
  c &= E_{g_1}([c]_{g_1},r_1) = g_1^{[c]_{g_1}}r_1^m \pmod m \\
  c &= E_{g_2}([c]_{g_2},r_2) = g_2^{[c]_{g_2}}r_2^m \pmod m\\
  g_1 &= E_{g_2}([g_1]_{g_2},r_3) = g_2^{[g_1]_{g_2}}r_3^m \pmod m\\
  g_2 &= E_{g_1}([g_2]_{g_1},r_4) = g_1^{[g_2]_{g_1}}r_4^m \pmod m\\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={141}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[cf369d9476ebea52b7586bd8436f379c]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={143}
\begin{aligned}
  c &= (g_1^{[g_2]_{g_1}}r_4^m)^{[c]_{g_2}}r_2^m = E_{g_1}([c]_{g_2}[g_2]_{g_2}, r_2r_4^{[c]_{g_2}}) \pmod m\\
  c &= (g_2^{[g_1]_{g_2}}r_3^m)^{[c]_{g_1}}r_1^m = E_{g_2}([c]_{g_1}[g_1]_{g_2}, r_1r_4^{[c]_{g_1}}) \pmod  m
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={148}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[86ba3989f24a915b0b9e5d5d2e3e577f]%mdk
$i\in \{0,1\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={149}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0bd890413bed9e9302718c8ccc74cda7]%mdk
$E_g$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={149}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[30e54458b4d047a44fdec90aa909b826]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={151}
\begin{aligned}
[c]_{g_2}[g_2]_{g_2} &= [c]_{g_1} \pmod m \\
[c]_{g_1}[g_1]_{g_2} &= [c]_{g_2} \pmod m
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[83977433a0a55b4c54af5962960229fc]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={158}
[c]_{g_1}[g_1]_{g_2}[g_2]_{g_2} = [c]_{g_1} \implies [g_1]_{g_2}[g_2]_{g_2} = 1 \pmod m
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5bc997afbd0192a61c20c5c320b3600d]%mdk
$[g_1]_{g_2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[5efb45f21109bfaee691ada19408056e]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={163}
[c]_{g_1} = [c]_{g_2}[g_1]_{g_2}^{-1} \pmod m
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={165}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[46f935c3ee4da9933c99c2663070627b]%mdk
$g_1 = g, c = c, g_2 = m+1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={166}

%mdk-data-line={168}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[753bd9ca5bd0e8dee271c3b1cc6eb0af]%mdk
$x,x' \in \Z^*_m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={168}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[20ca48d0f6862bf95ea84b011a0666d7]%mdk
$D_d(E_e(x)E_e(x') (\mod m^2)) = x+x' (\mod m)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={171}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[62595564bd618f6d34a48b28aa849645]%mdk
$E_e(x)E_e(x') = g^xr^mg^{x'}r'^m = g^{x + x'}(rr')^{m} = E_e(x+x',rr')$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={172}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4fae73fc3441f08d34fd57e19d57c972]%mdk
$r,r' \in \Z_m^{*} \pmod m \implies rr' \in Z_m^{*} \pmod m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={174}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1c529b14709cb27c13c6f67733611054]%mdk

$ bit is different depending on whether  $\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
